pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.height: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Ivysaur
pokemons.height: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: Venusaur
pokemons.height: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.height: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.height: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
